alert.note: Alert for Kemper; Leake; Neshoba; Winston (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 12 at 7:19AM CST until January 12 at 8:15AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Leake County in central Mississippi... Northwestern Kemper County in east central Mississippi... Southern Winston County in east central Mississippi... Northern Neshoba County in east central Mississippi... * Until 815 AM CST. * At 719 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Carthage, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Renfroe around 730 AM CST. Edinburg around 740 AM CST. Philadelphia and Pearl River around 745 AM CST. Burnside and Stallo around 755 AM CST. Nanih Waiya around 805 AM CST. Preston around 810 AM CST. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Noxapater, Standing Pine and Redwater. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 PM CST for central and east central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
